# 0xsomeone

warden

OG Warden

Head of Security Services @ Omniscia Mainly focusing on smart contract
security.

## Highlights

  * Ranked #24 on Code4rena all-time leaderboard

As of June 2023, I'm ranked #24 on Code4rena's all-time leaderboard, with
$119k+ in awards.

  * Placed 1st in Opensea Seaport 1.2 Code4rena audit

In this audit, I was the only person to find a high or medium severity
vulnerability in the codebase.

## 0xsomeone's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

  * [Github](https://github.com/alex-ppg)
